titleStmt.title: Emblema animæ or Morrall discourses reflecting upon humanitie. Written by John du Plessis now Cardinall of Richleu. Translated by I.M. Also varietie of obseruations delightfull to the minde
Emblema animae. English
titleStmt.author: Richelieu, Armand Jean de Plessis, duc de, 1585-1642.
Maxwell, James, b. 1581.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nic: and Joh: Okes,

notesStmt.note: Translator's note "To the reader" signed: J. Maxvvel.
The title page is engraved and signed: Will Marshall. sculpsit.
"The mindes delight .. Collected by I.M." has separate dated letterpress title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
